item.title: Mob burns Nigerian woman to death for alleged blasphemy
item.description: Police have condemned the killing as "jungle justice" vowing to bring the perpetrators to justice.

item.title: UN chief demands release of 11 staff arrested in Yemen
item.description: The food and children's agency workers are the latest UN staff detained by Houthi authorities.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump administration move to deport Guatemalan children
item.description: Advocacy groups sought emergency action amid reports planes carrying the children were about to take off.

item.title: Putin says he reached 'understandings' with Trump over end of Ukraine war
item.description: The Russian president also defended his decision to invade Ukraine, once again blaming the war on the West.

item.title: Fugitive wanted over Australia police killings being helped, police say
item.description: Dezi Freeman vanished into thick bushland after killing two police officers and hasn't been seen since.
